import React from 'react' import './cart.css' export const Cart = () => { const products = [ { name: "Casual Shoes", category: "Shoes", offerPrice: 999, inStock: true, image: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prebuiltui/prebuiltui/main/assets/card/productImage.png", }, { name: "Casual Shoes", category: "Shoes", offerPrice: 999, inStock: false, image: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prebuiltui/prebuiltui/main/assets/card/productImage2.png", }, { name: "Casual Shoes", category: "Shoes", offerPrice: 999, inStock: true, image: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prebuiltui/prebuiltui/main/assets/card/productImage3.png", }, ]; return (

Shopping Cart 3 Items

Product Details

Subtotal

Action

{products.map((product, index) => (

{product.name}

Size: {product.size || "N/A"}

Qty:

${product.offerPrice * product.quantity}

) )}

Order Summary

Delivery Address

No address found

{showAddress && (

setShowAddress(false)} className="text-gray-500 p-2 hover:bg-gray-100"> New York, USA

setShowAddress(false)} className="text-indigo-500 text-center cursor-pointer p-2 hover:bg-indigo-500/10"> Add address

)}

Payment Method

Price$20

Shipping FeeFree

Tax (2%)$20

Total Amount:$20

) }
